children.value: is where these two meet in a lovely swirl of collaborative learning and organically emergent systems.
It's a draft document written up by
in 1999. The mini-manifesto describes a set of
that people can use to set up their own indie study groups outside of formal structures like universities.
While the original focused on IRL, "co-present"
groups, I'm fascinated by how we might adapt these patterns and turn them into internet-friendly, distributed digital versions.
Here's notes on the original while I'm thinking it through...
